text: Gerd Ruge (9 August 1928 – 15 October 2021) was a German journalist, author and filmmaker. He worked with Nordwestdeutscher Rundfunk (NWDR), Arbeitsgemeinschaft der öffentlich-rechtlichen Rundfunkanstalten der Bundesrepublik Deutschland (ARD), and Westdeutscher Rundfunk (WDR). Ruge died in Munich on 15 October 2021 at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German journalists Category:German movie directors Category:German screenwriters Category:German movie producers Category:Writers from Hamburg
